en.trans-thank_you_description-1: Your message has been successfully submitted, and I want to personally thank you for taking the time to get in touch.
en.trans-thank_you_description-2: I carefully review each inquiry to ensure I fully understand your needs, and I will get back to you as soon as possible.
en.trans-thank_you_description-3: In the meantime, feel free to explore more of the website, check out my past projects, or connect with me on social media.
en.trans-thank_you_description-4: Looking forward to making great things happen together!

es.trans-thank_you_description-1: Tu mensaje ha sido enviado exitosamente, y quiero agradecerte personalmente por tomarte el tiempo de ponerte en contacto.
es.trans-thank_you_description-2: Reviso cuidadosamente cada consulta para asegurarme de comprender tus necesidades, y te responderé lo antes posible.
es.trans-thank_you_description-3: Mientras tanto, siéntete libre de explorar más el sitio web, revisar mis proyectos pasados o conectarte conmigo en redes sociales.
es.trans-thank_you_description-4: ¡Espero con ansias hacer grandes cosas juntos!
